name: XRD Portal
tagline: This is a portal for an XRD department at a University. It just queues samples and manages files as well as notices.
body: The project is written in CodeIgniter with a MySQL database as well as Bootstrap for UI. It also uses the JMol library for rendering cif files and graphic models in a browser Java applet.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
